This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Pulsing ball of white light traveling west.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was traveling north on I-25 toward the Hwy 119 exit. I noticed a small ball of light pulsing on and off in the sky near a cloud in front of me. It slowly began to travel west, continuing to pulse on and off. I firt thought it my have been light reflecting off of a plane. After approximately two minutes it stopped moving, pulsed off, and did not return. It had no contrail, and started moving from a dead stop. I was shocked by what I saw, and tried to film it with my phone camera. It is visable, but I only hve 30sec of recording time. During the video it is stationary(pulsing on and off)in a cloud in the lower right hand side of the screen.
